LanguageData.XMonsters_AwfulAimingDelay.label: awful aiming speed
LanguageData.XMonsters_AwfulAimingDelay.description: It will take him a loooooong time to aim.
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryBadAimingDelay.label: very low aiming speed
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryBadAimingDelay.description: Carriers of this gene have very low aiming speed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_BadAimingDelay.label: low aiming speed
LanguageData.XMonsters_BadAimingDelay.description: Carriers of this gene have low aiming speed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_GoodAimingDelay.label: high aiming speed
LanguageData.XMonsters_GoodAimingDelay.description: Carriers of this gene have a high aiming speed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryGoodAimingDelay.label: very high aiming speed
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryGoodAimingDelay.descriptio: Carriers of this gene have a very high aiming speed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_ProfessionalAimingDelay.label: professional aiming speed
LanguageData.XMonsters_ProfessionalAimingDelay.descri: You don't have time to turn away, and he already has time to take aim.
